Reviews.Title: The best blackberry
Reviews.Author: Sanyorby
Reviews.Content: Blackberry is the most complete, light, great features, outstanding camera, is great for its size, I recommend it with eyes closed.

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEAL 4 STARTS
Reviews.Author: Rafael J. Lovera
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT THIS PHONE FOR 202 BUCKS LAST WEEK FROM AMAZON AND NOW IS LISTED AT 290, GREAT TIMING HUH ? WELL LET ME TELL YOU THE PHONE IS REEALLY BRAND NEW, ALL ACCESORIES WERE SEALED, I GIVE IT 5 STARTS !!! ABOUT THE 3G THIS PHONE FROM AMAZON 1,4,8, SO 3G FOR TMOBILE, DIGITEL IN VENEZUELA ... GOOD LUCK !!!

Reviews.Title: exelente
Reviews.Author: Dany Sanchez
Reviews.Content: este telefono biene exelente y funciona para venezuela con cualquier operadora lo unico es el precio. deveria ser mas economico

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Jesikintero
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto.... Es tal cual como lo describe el vendedor, super conforme con mi compra! lo recomiendo al cien por ciento...

Reviews.Title: Perfect backup phone
Reviews.Author: Evgeny Morozov
Reviews.Content: If you need to text, call and receive calls - it's perfect. Camera is handy, gives clean pictures. Connection stable, sound good. Other stuff is pretty useless (like office, internet browsers, etc), but it's good to know you have it and in case of necessity (for example if your life depends on whether you can read the ms word document or not) you are safe. Trackpad may freak somebody out, and because of it in my case games are impossible to play to. Maybe my fingers are incompatible with it, who knows. Battery lasts long.Bottom line: nice, reliable, good looking cell phone.

Reviews.Title: I'll recommend for all my friend and family
Reviews.Author: Evelyn
Reviews.Content: all is fine for me.... the product is good and the amazon services is so good!!I like it..I'll recommend for all my friend and family...

Reviews.Title: Cell-phone with lots of class.
Reviews.Author: Rudy Barajas
Reviews.Content: this phone in my opinion is a beauty. its powerful yet compact. I first baught this phone through verizon with a contract. I really liked it except the track ball would get stuck after dust accumulates underneath it. But the 9100 version eliminates that problem resulting in again a phone with lots of class. :)

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: plozada
Reviews.Content: compre este teléfono para mi hija, me siento totalmente agradecido, lo recibí liberado completo con todos sus accesarios,100% nuevo de cajita, funciona con la operadora de mil maravillas, gracias

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Rosa
Reviews.Content: teléfono de buena calidad, excelente compra. muy acertada, llego a Venezuela  a tiempo. sin inconveniente. muy bueno a mi me encanto y buen material

Reviews.Title: una buena compra
Reviews.Author: Ruthi
Reviews.Content: El celular llego a tiempo, el modelo especificado y buen precio.Lo recomiendoEl celular llego a tiempo, el modelo especificado y buen precio.Lo recomiendo

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Pearl 9100 GSM
Reviews.Author: HERMANAXO
Reviews.Content: levanta 3g para digitel aca en venezuela, excelente, me llego con todos sus accesorios, no me presento problemas de ningun tipo

Reviews.Title: Everything has been good..!
Reviews.Author: Ronald
Reviews.Content: Everything has been great, i have to test it when i return home and see if it works well with Venezuelan's Mobile Co.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Linda De Costa
Reviews.Content: This is a great blackberry phone, functions well, no complaints. Arrived in a very short time. My brother is quite please with his cellphone.

Reviews.Title: Excelent!
Reviews.Author: Carmen Arelys Mendez
Reviews.Content: I had other Blackberry Pearl models but none like this one. When I bought it I was afraid that it could be a reburbished phone (I had that experience before, it says new on the product but when I receive it I find out it is refurbished). Not this time! The box was the original and it has all the manuals and complements. This telephone has worked for quite a while with me, never collapsed, is very portable (small), you can have lots of applications working at the same time and is so much better that previous models.The downside is that the battery only last a day. I have to recharge it every day.

Reviews.Title: all flawless
Reviews.Author: Edwar Castaño
Reviews.Content: The phone is small and practical suits my needsplacing the touch button makes much useoverall a good team

Reviews.Title: where the band goes 3G
Reviews.Author: francisco
Reviews.Content: I am interested in the phone Blackberry Pearl 9100 but I want to know if the 3g works with the band 2 = 1900mhz

Reviews.Title: inquietudes
Reviews.Author: josemorales
Reviews.Content: buenas tardes amigo es para saber si el telefono esta desbloqueado y tiene el idioma espanol es para venezuela. gracias
